eu.mf2c.pm.security

Class CauClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • eu.mf2c.pm.security.CauClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class CauClient
extends Thread
    A client to communicate with the local CAU and obtain an agent certificate. In IT-1: after obtaining the certificate from the cloud CA via the local CAU, it will perform a SSL handshake with the leader CAU to verify the certificate. Then it calls the Categorisation block via REST to trigger the agent categorisation process.

    Author:
    Shirley Crompton, shirley.crompton@stfc.ac.uk org Data Science and Technology Group, UKRI Science and Technology Council Date 5 Apr 2018
